Loopable - Interface in controller
This interface rappresent an object that manages the loop mode
LoopableComponent - Interface in model
A class that implements this interface has the loop management
LoopableMusicPlayer - Class in controller.musicplayer
An extension of the class ClassicMusicPlayer that add the management of the Loop mode This class implement the interface Loopable

LoopManager - Class in model

LoopStrategy - Enum in view.buttons.strategies
